title: Chiral Symmetry Breaking in the $d=3$ Nambu-Jona-Lasinio Model in Curved Spacetime
abstract: The phase structure of the $d=3$ Nambu-Jona-Lasinio model in curved spacetime is considered to leading order in the $1/N$--expansion and in the linear curvature approximation. The possibility of a curvature-induced first-order phase transition is investigated numerically. The dynamically generated fermionic mass is calculated for some values of the curvature.
